original_title: ¡Viva La Causa! 500 Years Of Chicano History
overview: An introduction to the history of the Mexican American people from their origins in Europe's invasion of the American continent up through World War II, through the Chicano Movement years to the present day. Includes archival footage and lively music ranging from corridos to rap.
title: ¡Viva La Causa! 500 Years Of Chicano History
